content: woods and water this pattern was created for the 2014 minnesota yarn shop hop by roxanne for all about yarn the pattern and yarn color were inspired by her view on little birch lake materials one stitch key skein of dream in double twisted yarn over put the needle into the stitch as if to knit and then color classy with wrap the yarn around both needles and cashmere and a then around the needle you are knitting size 10/24 inch with again and pull through the circular needle or stitch this not only twists the stitch but similar yardage of elongates it as well worsted weight yarn cast on 100 stitches very loosely place a marker and join into the round note you have enough yarn to cast on 120 stitches for a little longer cowl cowl size is 30 circumference round 1 knit round 2 purl round 3 knit round 4 purl rounds 5-8 *yarn over knit 2tog * repeat around round 9-20 repeat rounds 1-8 once and then rounds 1-4 once more round 21 do a double twisted yarn over in the first and every stitch in this round round 22 purl round 23 do a double twisted yarn over in the first and every stitch in this round rounds 24-43 repeat rounds 1-20 bind off loosely i like to use this bind off purl two stitches together and then place that stitch back on the needle in your left hand and repeat u ntil all stitches are cast off
